name: Detroit Sound
description: Upbeat 808 percussion; simple, funky mallet instruments, keys, strings, and synth bass; and street-centric, often punched-in rapping.

children.name: Flint Sound
children.description: Uptempo and repetitive, featuring simple melodies, pitched-up snares, and humorous, punchline-heavy lyrics.

children.name: Philly Drill
children.description: Apocalyptic and haunting choirs, keys, and strings with gruesome narratives and slow, sparse drums.
